report.title: Odd Panic
report.author: New Fall
report.bodytext: I had just heard of Melatonin helping people get to sleep, so I went out to the grocery store and bought some. /n /n T=10:45 - Took 3 mg Melatonin with a glass of water /n /n T+0:15 - Very heavy tired feeling, craving sleep. I decided to get ready for bed and lie down. /n /n T+0:20 - Heart rate feels like it is increasing, I am very tired but I cannot close my eyes. /n /n T+0:30 - I feel like I am having a panic attack, I am not. Harder to breathe, difficult to form positive thoughts. /n /n T+0:35 - Seems like I am heading back to baseline, except with a slight headache. Still a little difficult to breathe, and my left eye hurts. /n /n T+0:37 - I try using my muscles but it seems like they are too weak to do anything. Still trying to fall asleep, but can't. /n /n T+0:40 - Still trying to sleep. /n /n That was the last entry in the journal, no vivid dreams, sleep came harder than usual, and it was a horrid time.
